original: @117b // gtor ma bya ba ni /
analyzed: @117b // gtor ma bya ba ni /
translated: is as follows:

original: mdun du yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: mdun du yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor /
translated: In front of oneself, from yaṃ arises a wind mandala,

original: de'i steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: de'i steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor /
translated: upon which, from raṃ, is a fire mandala.

original: de'i steng du kam las mi'i mgo po @118a * //🔽gsum gyi steng du aa las thod pa /
analyzed: de'i steng du kam las mi'i mgo po @118a * // gsum gyi steng du aa las thod pa /
translated: Upon that, from kaṃ, is a human head.🔽Upon that, from a, is a skull cup.

original: de'i steng du shu bi mu ma ra /🔽na go ku da ha /🔽aom tram aam kham h'um /
analyzed: de'i steng du shu bi mu ma ra / na go ku da ha / aom tram aam kham h'um /
translated: Upon that, from śū, is a buffalo head,🔽from bi, a horse head, from mu, an ox head,

original: lam mam pam tam bam rnams bsams te /
analyzed: lam mam pam tam bam rnams bsams te /
translated: from ma, an elephant head, from ra, a peacock head,🔽from ṇi, a swan head, from da, a hawk head,🔽from ha, a vulture head, and from ka, a crow head.🔽Upon that, from oṃ, āḥ, and hūṃ, are white, red, and blue drops.

original: de'i steng du aom dkar po dang a'a:dmar po dang h'um nag po rnams steng dang steng du bsams te /
analyzed: de'i steng du aom dkar po dang a'a:dmar po dang h'um nag po rnams steng dang steng du bsams te /
translated: Upon that, from oṃ, āḥ, and hūṃ, are white, red, and blue drops.

original: aom brjod pas de rnams la thim pas gong bu dkar po cig tu song bar bsam /🔽a'a:zhes brjod pas de rnams la thim pas dmar po hrol hrol cig tu song bar bsam /🔽h'um zhes brjod pas de rnams la thim pa'i stobs kyis /
analyzed: aom brjod pas de rnams la thim pas gong bu dkar po cig tu song bar bsam / a'a:zhes brjod pas de rnams la thim pas dmar po hrol hrol cig tu song bar bsam / h'um zhes brjod pas de rnams la thim pa'i stobs kyis /
translated: Saying oṃ, those dissolve into the drops, which become a white sphere.🔽Saying āḥ, those dissolve into the drops, which become a moist red sphere.

original: dngul chu'i mdog lta bur song bar bsam /
analyzed: dngul chu'i mdog lta bur song bar bsam /
translated: Saying hūṃ, those dissolve into the drops, which become the color of mercury.

original: de nas mdun du chos 'byung gru gsum gyi nang du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams la /
analyzed: de nas mdun du chos 'byung gru gsum gyi nang du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams la /
translated: Then, in the front, in the interior of a triangular source of phenomena, imagine an eight-petaled lotus.

original: 'dab ma brgyad kyi dkyil du 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa bsam /
analyzed: 'dab ma brgyad kyi dkyil du 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa bsam /
translated: In the center of the eight petals, imagine a six-spoked wheel.

original: de la dag pa gsum brjod pas /
analyzed: de la dag pa gsum brjod pas /
translated: By reciting the three purities,

original: 'khor lo rtsibs drug tu lha mo drug dang lte ba la rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang / pha rol gyi 'dab ma brgyad la zhing skyong brgyad dang bcas pa bsams la /
analyzed: 'khor lo rtsibs drug tu lha mo drug dang lte ba la rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang / pha rol gyi 'dab ma brgyad la zhing skyong brgyad dang bcas pa bsams la /
translated: imagine the six goddesses on the six spokes of the wheel, Vajrayoginī in the center, and the eight field protectors on the eight outer petals.

original: gtor ma dbul ba'i sngags ni /
analyzed: gtor ma dbul ba'i sngags ni /
translated: The mantra for offering the bali is:

original: aom shr'i badzra yo gi n'i karma r'u bi ni dzva la mu khi ni /
analyzed: aom shr'i badzra yo gi n'i karma r'u bi ni dzva la mu khi ni /
translated: oṃ śrī vajra yoginī karma rudravin nijvala mukhini

original: aom hr'i:kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat /
analyzed: aom hr'i:kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat /
translated: oṃ hriḥ kha kha khāhi khāhi hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ phaṭ

original: che ge mo sva sti ksha ma aa ro ga de hi danta ya//
analyzed: che ge mo sva sti ksha ma aa ro ga de hi danta ya//
translated: śāntika kṣamāro gadhe hṛdayanta

original: aom dha ya sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom dha ya sh'antim ku ru sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ dhaya śāntiṃ kuru svāhā

original: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa gnyis ka la dbul /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa gnyis ka la dbul /
translated: Recite this mantra to offer to both the mundane and supramundane deities.

original: de nas yi ge brgya pa bton la gshegs su gsol lo //
analyzed: de nas yi ge brgya pa bton la gshegs su gsol lo //
translated: Then, recite the hundred-syllable mantra and request their departure.

original: gtor ma'i cho ga aa bhi yu ka tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: gtor ma'i cho ga aa bhi yu ka tas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The ritual of the bali offering composed by Abhiyuktara is complete.
